name: variant_or
purpose: Performs a logical disjunction on two variants

return.description:
Variant OR Rules
    
     
      
       If left is
       If right is
       then the result is
      
     
     
      TRUETRUETRUE
      TRUEFALSETRUE
      TRUENULLTRUE
      FALSETRUETRUE
      FALSEFALSEFALSE
      FALSENULLNULL
      NULLTRUETRUE
      NULLFALSENULL
      NULLNULLNULL
